about_the_game:
Run Your Own Restaurant in a Peaceful Italian Village

Step into the shoes of a restaurant owner and immerse yourself in the charm of an Italian village. Build, expand, and customize your cozy restaurant, serving delicious bakery items and coffee to your customers. Manage resources, design your space, and grow your business at your own pace.

Design, Build, and Expand Your Space

Start with a simple setup and gradually expand your restaurant to accommodate more customers. Use your creativity to design and personalize every detail of your space. From furniture placement to decor, every choice is yours to make. Unlock new areas and features to make your restaurant a unique and inviting spot.

Serve Bakery Delights and Coffee

Prepare and serve a variety of baked goods and coffee to your customers. Keep them happy by ensuring fast service and delicious treats. As your restaurant grows, you’ll have access to new items and equipment that allow you to offer an even wider selection.

A Relaxing, Stress-Free Experience

Unlike challenging management games, this simulation focuses on a calming, stress-free gameplay experience. Customize your restaurant, manage your resources, and grow at your own pace without the pressure of high-stakes challenges. Perfect for players who enjoy creativity and want a soothing game environment.

Key Features:

  • Manage and grow your own restaurant in a beautiful Italian village

  • Serve bakery items and coffee to a variety of customers

  • Customize and expand your space with decorations and furniture

  • Relaxing gameplay designed to provide a stress-free experience

  • Perfect for fans of simulation, management, and design games

  • Single-player experience that lets you play at your own pace

Discover the joy of running your own restaurant, where creativity, management, and relaxation come together. Build the restaurant of your dreams and watch it thrive!
